alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 1:22PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northern York...south central Oxford and central Cumberland Counties... At 122 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was over Hiram, or 13 miles southeast of Fryeburg...moving east AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Portland, South Portland, Westbrook, Cumberland, Gorham, Falmouth, Buxton, Gray, Hollis, Hiram, Cornish, Standish, Raymond, Yarmouth, Scarborough, Casco, Limington, Limerick, Brownfield and Denmark. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 1 and 5, and near mile marker 9. Interstate 95 between mile markers 45 and 63. This also includes... Sebago Lake, Burnt Meadow Mountains, Douglas Mountain, and Mount Cutler. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Oxford
